attributes.action: call for a full impartial UN Inquiry into the Gaza war as called for by the UN board of inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call for a full impartial UN Inquiry into the Gaza war as called for by the UN board of inquiry."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20491


Prime Minister's Office
